column2: Three blessings to you, child. My name is Father Trulian, the priest here.
Stuff like this is the reason I gave up material possessions.
Please don't give me stuff like this.
You don't need to give me things, child.
Well, I guess a few material possessions is fine, right?
Praise the Goddess above, this is wonderful, child.
Ah yes, the board posting. Thank you, child.

column3: I hope to see you at church every Wednesday!
column4: I do my best to avoid material possessions. I even sleep at the church!

column3: Today is a beautiful day, isn't it?
